name: Canned Banners
tag_list: banner, ad, advertising, advertisement, display, online, do-it-yourself, flash, animated, swf, adobe, template, digital, custom, customize, build, marketing, web, internet, fast, easy, quick, cheap, affordable, demo, agency, freelance, interactive, small,
overview:
At Canned Banners, small businesses and marketing professionals can quickly create their own professional-looking Flash banner ads. Users select from a variety of templates and then add their own text, logo, and images.

Canned Banners offers small businesses access to sophisticated Flash banner design at a low price, and offers larger companies a cheaper and more nimble alternative to the agency process.

When compared to many other “make your own banner ad” websites, Canned Banners can differentiate itself in two key ways:

  1. Professional design. The templates offered by other “make your own banner ad” websites often appear amateurish and do not meet the needs of marketing professionals at medium to large companies. Canned Banners designs its templates to meet a professional standard of quality, and guides users through the process with a clean, easy-to-follow interface.

  2. Customers own their banners. Just like an ad agency, Canned Banners sends the finished banner file(s) to the customer, who then has the freedom to run the ad on any website or ad network. This is especially important for larger clients who engage in more complex media buys and advertise simultaneously on multiple ad networks or websites.
